Jargon Term: you had large veins in your esophagus called varices
START ciprofloxacin 500 mg daily for 4 days. When you complete the 4 day course, you will take 250 mg daily thereafter
START sucralfate 1 mg by mouth four times a day for 2 weeks
INCREASE lactulose - 2 - 3 doses per day, titrate to 2 - 3 bowel movements per day
